text: Also selects the previous entity while in cinematic mode.
Hold SHIFT and right-click drag to draw a movement path for your selection to follow.
Hold SHIFT while selecting units on the battlefield to select all units between previous selection and newest selection. This is useful for selecting long lines of units.
Hold CTRL and double left-click on a unit to select all units of that type.
Also selects the next entity while in cinematic mode.
Hold CTRL while giving a drag order to make the selected unit(s) walk to the destination.
Hold LALT while right-click dragging to drag selection in direction pulled, while maintaining their dimensions.
Hold RALT while right-click dragging to drag selection, using point clicked as centre front for drag-out.
Holding ALT, you can left-click drag your selection to tweak their location while maintaining their relative positioning. Hold CTRL while doing so to rotate the selection.
You can cancel giving an order/drag move before releasing the mouse button, by pressing escape or pressing the alternative mouse button.
Holding ALT as artillery will enter manual-aiming mode, allowing you to select an area on which to fire.
Holding ALT and right-clicking on an enemy unit will force a melee attack while not in melee mode.
